name: Clints Portfolio

projects.title: Dynamic Telecom Comparison Platform
projects.description: A dynamic web platform that helps users compare the latest smartphones, internet plans, and SIM deals in real time. It features an intuitive interface, advanced filtering options, and up-to-date pricing powered by live data integrations, ensuring users can make informed purchasing decisions effortlessly.

projects.title: Real-Time AI UI Editor
projects.description: An interactive, real-time UI editor that leverages AI to generate, modify, and optimize user interface components dynamically. It allows users to design and preview UI changes instantly, with intelligent recommendations and seamless drag-and-drop functionality. Built with a focus on real-time collaboration and AI-assisted design.

projects.title: ChatBot
projects.description: An AI-driven chatbot designed to provide dynamic, real-time conversations. It can answer queries, assist users with tasks, and engage in natural language interactions. Built with advanced language processing to enhance user experience and automate responses efficiently.

projects.title: Interactive Survey & Form System
projects.description: A dynamic form-building application that allows users to create, share, and collect responsesâ€”similar to Google Forms but with customizable features. The system includes form creation, response tracking, and a user-friendly interface for seamless data collection."

projects.title: Porting Project
projects.description: A web-based system for handling number porting requests, leveraging RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communication between carriers, users, and service providers. It automates request submissions, status tracking, and validation to ensure a smooth and efficient porting process."

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara:
I am a software developer with a strong foundation in general software development. I hold a bachelor's degree in Computer Science and specialize in automation building, streamlining workflows and enhancing efficiency through well-designed software solutions.

Beyond web development, my experience spans RESTful API-heavy applications as well as more lightweight, standalone solutions. I thrive on creating scalable and maintainable systems, whether itâ€™s optimizing backend processes, integrating complex APIs, or developing seamless user experiences.

Passionate about solving real-world problems through technology, I continuously explore innovative ways to enhance automation and software development.
